#Text=Nick Driver
#Text=Not to be confused with N. Driver , a DJ of the same name
#Text=Nick Driver is an American rock and Americana singer-songwriter , based in North Carolina .
#Text=In 2010 , he released his debut solo album , Warm Is Your Color , which had a top-ten song hit on Sirius XM 's The Coffee House radio station . [ 1 ]
#Text=Wildy 's World stated about Warm Is Your Color that "

#Text=He toured the United States in support of the album , which had a top ten song hit on Sirius XM 's The Coffeehouse , titled  Let 's Stay Together . " [ 1 ]

column1: #Text=Wildy 's World gave Warm Is Your Color a positive review and 3/5 stars , calling it an " adroit turn " and stating that " turning to word-heavy light acoustic pop ( ala Jason Mraz ) and balladry , Driver looks to bring the energy of punk to the finesse and precision of pop music " .
#Text=The review praised the creativity of several songs in particular , but criticized others for not suiting Driver 's style . "

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The more up-tempo acoustic pop songs work very well for Driver , whereas the slow ballads find Driver losing energy , focus and sound .  [ 2 ]

column1: #Text=Later that year , he released the EP Coffee House Hero : Live & Rare Acoustic B-Sides on Interscope Digital Distribution .
#Text=Driver self-released Poet 's Corner , Vol. One on September 25 , 2012 .

#Text=It received a positive review in Indy Week , which stated the album lacked adventure and is instead " a record of simple and openhearted tunes , and when it works , Driver offers the kind of amiable pop that Matt Nathanson would be proud to call his own , as with the endearing ' Collect the Rain ' " . [ 6 ]
#Text=Jonah Matranga sang backing vocals for Driver 's song " Universal Love " on the album Poets ' Corner Volume One in late 2012 .
#Text=In 2013 , he independently released two albums : Folsom Prison Blues and The Nicky D LP .

#Text=Driver 's songs have been featured on television shows , including Bad Girls Club : Atlanta on Oxygen Network , Kourtney and Kim Take Miami on E ! Network , The Real World : St. Thomas , and The Real World : Portland . [ 1 ]
#Text=On September 9 , 2014 , he released the EP Staring at My Ceiling in the Dark .
#Text=The Nick Driver Band
#Text=Formed to record on Driver 's studio albums and perform live , early on The Nick Driver Band included Driver , Darren Abbacchi , Elijah Ott , Billy Hinnant , and Jared Pyle . [ 3 ]
#Text=Other past members include Jade Werth on guitar , keyboards , and harp . [ 7 ]
#Text=In 2012 , The Nick Driver Band won " Best Rock Band in the Triangle " by The Independent Weekly in Raleigh . [ 8 ]

column1: #Text=The band has toured extensively throughout the United States , [ 3 ] and opened for groups such as Edward Sharpe and the Magnetic Zeros , North Mississippi All-Stars , Pat Benatar , The Lumineers , Jonas Brothers , Demi Lovato , Less Than Jake , and Creed .
#Text=The band has performed at festivals , including the Warped Tour , The American Music Festival , Celebrate Fairfax , and Floydfest 2013 . [ 8 ]
#Text=Members as of 2014 [ 7 ]
#Text=Nick Driver – vocals , guitars , songwriting
#Text=Darren Abbacchi – drums
#Text=Mike Chidsey – lead guitar
#Text=Style
#Text=Driver uses few effects in his solo material , and mostly relies on acoustic instruments . [ 9 ]
#Text=While he incorporates the stylings of multiple genres , much of his music has an " Americana , singer-songwriter feel " . [ 4 ]
#Text=According to Driver , " Jamie King from Swift is a big influence on me and my music .
